comments:
I have the following plug-ins from HEAD in my workspace (besides debug plug-
ins):

org.eclipse.core.commands
org.eclipse.jface
org.eclipse.ui.workbench

When I select a project in the package explorer, and try to open the context 
menu I get an NPE:

This support requires you to have core.resources from head as well... do you
have it checked out?

Same problem with core.resources and runtime checked out from HEAD (resources 
needed the latest runtime).

Oh. You also need ide checked out from head... but you have found a hole in our
logic.  Michael, the patch you asked me to submit assumes that the legacy
support class exists.  I will fix this for todays build.
With ide fronm HEAD I don't see the problem.

Created an attachment (id=17733)
Patch for org.eclipse.ui.workbench

Patch that should address the NPE.  Michael, can you please review and give me
thumbs up or down ASAP?

Michael, please incorporate the fix for this issue into the fix for 84590 and
update the patches on that PR.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 84590 ***

Moving to VERIFIED so it doesn't keep confusing me when I'm checking the status
